name: DATABASE NAME: required, 255 characters max
types: DATABASE TYPE: optional, delimited with semi-colon
keywords: ALT NAME / KEYWORDS: optional, delimited with semi-colon
slug: FRIENDLY URL: optional, unique, 100 characters max
best_bets: BEST BET SUBJECTS: optional, delimited with semi-colon
subjects: ADDITIONAL SUBJECTS: optional, delimited with semi-colon
resource_icons: RESOURCE ICON IDS: optional, delimited with semi-colon
thumbnail: THUMBNAIL IMAGE URL: optional, url, 1000 characters max
content_id: LIBGUIDES CONTENT ID: optional, unique, only used for updates

name: Follett Destiny
description: Our physical catalogue of 9,000 physical books and DVDs at the Learning Commons

name: National Film Board (NFB)
description: Log in with your school google account. NFB films can be played on campus without logging in (because we're using IP address authentication). We have an NFB Education licence and, therefore, can make use of the resources available on nfb.ca in the classroom.

name: New York Times
description: Your first visit to this database must be on-campus, to register your device. After that you can also access FT off-campus.

name: Press Reader
description: 7,000 newspapers & magazines from around the world.

name: Indigenous Oral Resources
description: Resources compiled by Chloe, Chanel, and Aila, in the English First People 12 course, June 2024

name: Flipster
description: Offers online access to Education Week.
